name: LivingSituation
title: Living Situation
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing questions about living situations/living arrangements.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have documentation of their living situation.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Living Situation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Living Situation.)

contains.display: Patient lives with other person [CMS Assessment]
Patient lives in congregated situtation [CMS Assessment]
Living situation and availability of assistance [CMS Assessment]
